TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WorkflowMarkupSerializationException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 由执行序列化和反序列化的方法引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown by methods that perform serialization and deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 包括有关导致引发异常的行和列位置的信息。 includes information about the line and column locations that caused the exception to be thrown.
